message: server message: hello all i am surya with new update of game. Fiter v 20250619  what's new?  first of all congratulations to all users because fiter project completed 10 months of journey.  added one unique mode called battle mode.all navigation related bugs and functionality related bug for csr screen reader has been fixed.  store item counter has been re designed for the easy to use. in home screen added welcome player  message which actual player name. now i am happy the announce this fighter version is 100% staple and 100% bug free. download from following link: https://suryavs.net.in/fiter-v20250619.apk or download by checking updates in game. happy playing to all users!
